radiographic_examinations.findings: The gallbladder is distended with wall thickening, mural edema, and surrounding fat stranding. Atelectasis is noted in the lung bases. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. Common bile duct measures 5 mm. Sigmoid diverticulosis without acute diverticulitis. There is a small amount of free fluid in the pelvis. No worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
